title: Sample Book, ca. 1910
medium: Medium: paper, leather, cotton, silk; printed
description: Paper folders of wide ribbon and textile samples within two detached board covers with dark, worn marbled paper, sueded leather binding. Includes samples of printed satins and chiné.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. Medium: paper, leather, cotton, silk; printed. Gift of Augusta Dillon. 1949-82-4.
